description:
Episode 4: During the holiday season, it's easy to forget about yourself. But that's not Lorelei Lee's problem when Beretta James shows up for an electro BDSM session.
Lorelei treats herself with a gift and has Beretta worship her. However, Lorelei's not someone who's easily pleased and has Beretta experience intense pain and suffering with her various electrosex toys. A violet wand with a teardrop attachment contorts the electroslut's body into spasms of agony and Lorelei continues her lesbian BDSM games.
But Lorelei's not done. She continues to make Beretta bow down and suffer before her without reward or pleasure!
title: Bow Down with No Reward
